titles.title: Urging the Secretary of the Interior to recognize the historical significance of Roberto Clemente's place of death near PiÃ±ones in LoÃ­za, Puerto Rico, by adding it to the National Register of Historic Places.

Urging the Secretary of the Interior to recognize the historical significance of Roberto Clemente's place of death near PiÃ±ones in LoÃ­za, Puerto Rico, by adding it to the National Register of Historic Places.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-988.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 189.

action.text: Mr. Bishop (UT) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 792.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 385 - 1, 2 Present (Roll no. 426).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
Honors the memory of Roberto Clemente as a great humanitarian and athlete.
Requests that the Department of the Interior recognize the crash site of Clemente's airplane and the adjacent land by adding such site to the National Register of Historic Places.
